articles.title: Honda to Buy Ohio Battery Plant Assets From LGES for $2.9B
articles.mainIdea: Honda to Buy Ohio Battery Plant Assets From LGES for $2.9B
articles.summary: Zacks: Honda to Buy Ohio Battery Plant Assets From LGES for $2.9B. HMC is set to buy Ohio battery plant building assets from LG Energy Solution for about $2.9 billion, aiming to boost efficiency at its JV ahead of 2025 operations. Related tickers mentioned: 373220.KS, GM, HNDAF, OPLN.

articles.title: LG Energy Solution to sell Ohio battery plant building to Honda for $2.85bn
articles.mainIdea: LG Energy Solution to sell Ohio battery plant building to Honda for $2.85bn
articles.summary: Just Auto: LG Energy Solution to sell Ohio battery plant building to Honda for $2.85bn. In a transaction valued at Won4.22tn according to a regulatory filing, the deal covers the building and related infrastructure owned by subsidiary L-H Battery Company. Related tickers mentioned: 373220.KS.

articles.title: Honda Motor (TSE:7267): Reassessing Valuation After a Steady Share Price Grind Higher
articles.mainIdea: Honda Motor (TSE:7267): Reassessing Valuation After a Steady Share Price Grind Higher
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Honda Motor (TSE:7267): Reassessing Valuation After a Steady Share Price Grind Higher. Honda Motor (TSE:7267) has been quietly grinding higher this month, and that steady move is catching investor attention as they reassess what they are actually paying for its earnings power and cash generation. See our latest analysis for Honda Motor. That gentle climb has come after a choppier few months, with the 1 year total shareholder return of 8.8 percent and a powerful 3 year total shareholder return of roughly 74 percent suggesting long term momentum is still very much intact, even as...
